version_description: Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes.

We’re constantly working to make SoundCloud the best it can be. Here are the latest additions for you to enjoy:
- A new Collection screen with all your likes, playlists, albums and stations in one place.
- Rediscover and continue listening to your favorites with new recently played tracks. See what you listened to that day, past week, month or more.

We’re constantly working to make SoundCloud the best it can be. Here are the latest additions for you to enjoy:
- A new Collection screen with all your likes, playlists, albums and stations in one place.
- Dive back into an album, or rediscover your favorites with a new section for recently played tracks and your entire listening history.

We’re constantly working to make SoundCloud the best it can be. Here are the latest additions for you to enjoy:
- A new Collection screen with all your likes, playlists, albums and stations in one place.
- Dive back into an album, or rediscover your favorites with a new section for recently played tracks and your entire listening history.

We’re constantly working to make SoundCloud the best it can be. Here are the latest additions for you to enjoy:
- A new Collection screen with all your likes, playlists, albums and stations in one place.

We’re constantly working to make SoundCloud the best it can be. Here are the latest additions for you to enjoy:
- A new Collection screen with all your likes, playlists, albums and stations in one place.
- Dive back into an album, or rediscover your favorites with a new section for recently played tracks and your entire listening history.

We noticed SoundCloud was getting a little buggy when saving tons of content online, so in this release we've made improvements to offline listening with SoundCloud Go, alongside some other bug fixes.

A few other updates from recent releases:
- A new Collection screen with all your likes, playlists, albums and stations in one place.
- Dive back into an album, or rediscover your favorites with a new section for recently played tracks and your entire listening history.
Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Performance improvements and bug fixes.

We’re happy to announce the latest way to experience SoundCloud – offline and ad-free for just $5.99/month. Listen to all the amazing tracks you can only find on SoundCloud anywhere, anytime with our new SoundCloud Go subscription. 

Our existing $12.99 subscription is also sticking around, but because you get millions of additional tracks in addition to offline ad-free listening, we’ve renamed it SoundCloud Go+.

We’re happy to announce the latest way to experience SoundCloud – offline and ad-free for just $5.99/month. Listen to all the amazing tracks you can only find on SoundCloud anywhere, anytime with our new SoundCloud Go subscription. 

Our existing $12.99 subscription is also sticking around, but because you get millions of additional tracks in addition to offline ad-free listening, we’ve renamed it SoundCloud Go+.
We update SoundCloud every week, making it quicker and easier to discover great new music. Make sure you update to the latest version so that you never miss a beat.

We're always updating SoundCloud to make discovering exciting new music quicker and easier. In this release, we've added support for Chromecast, to bring your listening experience to the big screen. Cast your favorite tracks, lean back and hear an endless mix of related music based on your tastes.

We update SoundCloud regularly, making little tweaks so that it's quicker and easier to listen to your favorite tracks, and discover brilliant new artists. 

Make sure to keep your app updated in order to get the latest features.

We constantly improve SoundCloud to keep the tunes flowing and beats bumping! Check out our newest updates:

- NOW: easily navigate to a creator’s profile from a track or playlist. Simply tap the overflow menu then choose “Go to creator’s profile”.
- FEATURING: comprehensive design updates for the iPhone X including a sleek, new UI for the Player.
- SQUASHED: bugs in our code while improving app performance.

- FEATURING: comprehensive design updates for the iPhone X including a sleek, new UI for the Player.

We constantly improve Soundcloud to keep the tunes flowing and beats bumping! Check out our newest updates:

- NOW: easily navigate to a creator’s profile from a track or playlist. Simply tap the overflow menu then choose “Go to creator’s profile”.
- FEATURING: comprehensive design updates for the iPhone X including a sleek, new UI for the Player.
- SQUASHED: bugs in our code while improving app performance!

ANNOUNCING: A new discovery experience! 

With over 165 million tracks and 10 million creators, there’s always something new to stream or share on SoundCloud. Now we’re making the discovery process even easier, serving up community-curated recommendations and personalized playlists so you’re always at the front of music culture.

IT'S NOT OVER YET: we have a special gift for you this holiday season - tracks on SoundCloud now have a repeat button! Digging a tune? Go forth and loop it so the party never stops.

- Now you can swipe and browse tracks that you Spotlight within your profile page

Loving the app? Rate us to make it official. Have questions or suggestions? Find us on Twitter @SoundCloud or the SoundCloud Help Center. We're always listening.

We improved performance and squashed bugs.

Performance improvements and bug fixes.

Have questions or suggestions? Go online and check out the SoundCloud Help Center. We are always listening.

Our team listens to the all new jams, including your feedback:
- Fixed: a performance issue causing the app to crash 
- Fixed: a performance issue causing increased time to start playback

Need help? We are always listening. Tap here to find an answer to your question:
https://help.soundcloud.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=464647

Our team listens to all the new jams, including your feedback:
- FIXED: a crash when deleting a track from your playlist
- SYNCED: updating your playlist image on a computer will also update the image on the app
- SQUASHED: bugs in our code to improve performance and reliability

Have questions or suggestions? Then go online and check out the SoundCloud Help Center. We are always listening.

Performance improvements and bug fixes.

Performance improvements and bug fixes.

Have questions or suggestions? Go online and check out the SoundCloud Help Center. We are always listening.

NOW FEATURING: an all-new Miniplayer!

With over 165 million tracks and 10 million creators, there’s always something new to discover on SoundCloud. The Miniplayer makes it easier to browse content while listening to a track. Tap on the Miniplayer to expand it for more actions, or drag it back down to continue searching while bumping your favorite jams. Slide it back and forth to quickly skip between tracks.

Have questions or suggestions? Go online and check out the SoundCloud Help Center. We are always listening.

*airhorn* Comments on mobile are back! You can now comment on tracks anytime, anywhere, right from your phone. 

- Easy navigation: Tap the comment bubble in the player to read and write new comments. 
- Give and receive feedback instantly: Have more flexibility over when and where you share feedback on your favorite tracks.
- More control and freedom: Easily delete and leave comments on tracks.

Happy commenting! 

- Team SoundCloud

Have you heard? Comments on mobile are back! You can now comment on tracks anytime, anywhere, right from your phone.

Bug fixes and improvements in this release include:
- Fixed a bug preventing comment bubbles from floating to the bottom after being dragged up
- Fixed a bug preventing the status bar from always being visible
- Multiple performance improvements to keep the app humming under the hood

Enjoy the tunes! 

- Team SoundCloud

We squashed a bug that could cause certain devices to crash.

Have you heard? Comments on mobile are back! You can now comment on tracks anytime, anywhere, right from your phone.
Bug fixes and improvements in this release include:
- Fixed a bug preventing comment bubbles from floating to the bottom after being dragged up
- Fixed a bug preventing the status bar from always being visible
- Multiple performance improvements to keep the app humming under the hood

Enjoy the tunes!

- Team SoundCloud

NEW FEATURE: SoundCloud Weekly. It's now easier than ever to discover what’s next in music, first on SoundCloud, with our new personalized playlist.

Not seeing it in your feed? Keep on listening, liking, reposting and sharing the tracks you’re loving, and look for your SoundCloud Weekly playlist to appear the following Monday.

Enjoy the tunes!

- Team SoundCloud

We constantly improve SoundCloud to keep the tunes flowing and beats bumping! Check out our newest updates:

Opening a link to a track on SoundCloud now takes you directly to the player for a faster and smoother playback experience.
Skip directly to the exact play time of a comment.
And of course, we improved performance and squashed bugs.

Have questions or suggestions? Go online and check out the SoundCloud Help Center. We are always listening.

- Fixed a bug where artists and stations were not showing up in your Recently Played
- Fixed a bug where the incorrect "updated" date was showing on SoundCloud Weekly
- Fixed an occasional crash on startup

 - Fixed a bug that prevented users from removing tracks from their playlists
